name: next-task
description: Master workflow orchestrator with autonomous task-to-production automation, quality gates, and multi-agent review

hooks.prompt:
Implementation complete. Before proceeding to review, run pre-review quality gates:
1. Launch deslop-work agent to clean AI slop from new work (committed but unpushed changes)
2. Launch test-coverage-checker agent to validate test coverage
Run both in parallel, then proceed to review-orchestrator.

Review iteration complete. Check the review result:
- If APPROVED (critical=0, high=0): Run delivery-validator agent to autonomously validate task completion
- If NOT APPROVED: Run deslop-work agent to clean any slop introduced by review fixes, then re-run review-orchestrator
No human intervention - workflow continues autonomously.

Delivery validation complete. Check the result:
- If APPROVED: Run docs-updater agent to update documentation related to changes, then proceed to ship phase
- If NOT APPROVED: Return to implementation phase with the fix instructions from the validator
No human intervention - workflow continues autonomously.
